title: Minecraft Java版 1.14 Pre-Release 1 发布
author: SPGoding
txt_content:
本帖最后由 SPGoding 于 2019-4-14 17:49 编辑 
预发布版是Minecraft的测试机制，如果该版本作为正式版发布，那么预发布版的游戏文件将与启动器推送的正式版完全相同。
然而，预发布版主要用于服主和Mod制作者的预先体验，如果发现致命漏洞，该预发布版会被新的预发布版代替。因此对于普通玩家建议持观望态度。
Minecraft 1.14 仍未发布，1.14 Pre-Release 1 为其第 1 个预发布版，第 33 个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。




Minecraft 1.14 Pre-Release 1 
Minecraft 1.14 第一个预发布版
A Village & Pillage Java Pre-Release
一个村庄与掠夺更新的预发布版

We're now feeling confident enough in the stability and feature-completeness of 1.14 - The Village & Pillage Update - that we've decided to enter the pre-release phase. Whilst we know that there are still bugs to be solved and polish to be added, we feel that this version is now good enough that we can ask you all to please help us test and find any issues for a smooth release in a few weeks. Remember to report anything you find to ourbug tracker, or give feedback on new features over to our feedback website. It helps us immensely!我们对于 1.14 ——村庄与掠夺更新——的完整度和稳定性十分自信，并进入了预发布阶段。虽然还有些 bug 需要调整，当前的版本已经足够让大家来测试了，几周之内就会发布正式版。记得在漏洞追踪器反馈所有你遇到的问题，或者在反馈网站上提出新特性的建议。我们超需要它们的！

CHANGES IN 1.14 PRE-RELEASE 1
1.14 第一个预发布版中的改动内容

Fixed lots of bugs修复大量漏洞Some optimizations一些优化Inside optimize world screen there's now an option to remove cached world data (e.g. height maps and light), so that it's recomputed on the next load内置的「优化世界」选项有了移除世界缓存（比如高度图和光照）的选项了，移除后会在下一次加载世界时重新计算。


FIXED BUGS IN 1.14 PRE-RELEASE 1
1.14 第一个预发布版中的漏洞修复

MC-134755- All short mobs drown just below the surface of waterMC-134755- 矮的生物会在水表面以下就开始窒息MC-137451- Mobs heads rotate super quickly when looking aroundMC-137451- 生物在四处看风景时头扭得超快MC-138979- Scaffolding switches quickly between entity and block when placed on some non-solid blocksMC-138979- 脚手架被放在非固体方块上时会快速在实体和方块间切换MC-139255- Cave ambient sounds are not playingMC-139255- 不播放洞穴环境音效MC-140936- The tall grass in the plains village structures doesn't take the block it spawns on into considerationMC-140936- 平原村庄里生成高草时，不会检查它所在的方块是否允许生成。MC-142134- Light sources spontaneously not working in some chunksMC-142134- 光源不在某些区块中工作MC-142228- Skylight shines through blocksMC-142228- 天空亮度穿过方块MC-142729- Puffed puffer fishes with "NoAI" tag can shrink downMC-142729- NoAI 的河豚能够缩小MC-142768- Mobs can suffocate below blocks, if the eye height isn't inside the collision boxMC-142768- 如果眼睛的高度不在碰撞箱内，怪物可以在方块下方窒息MC-143112- Duplicated files in village structureMC-143112- 村庄结构重复MC-143591- Spiders and cave spiders fly-climbMC-143591- 蜘蛛和洞穴蜘蛛飞起来爬MC-143699- Trader llamas won't despawnMC-143699- 行商羊驼不会被清除MC-144798- Barrels always try to set their "open" state to falseMC-144798- 一直尝试将桶的 open 状态设置为 falseMC-145031- Crash while ticking barrelMC-145031- 桶被[ruby=tick]加载[/ruby]时崩溃MC-145766- Iron golems spawning at an alarming rateMC-145766- 铁傀儡以惊人的速度生成MC-146295- Loom top texture is backwardsMC-146295- 织布机顶部材质反了MC-146538- Eye position for riptiding player is incorrectMC-146538- 激流状态的玩家眼睛位置有误MC-146800- Villager can make the discount number of unstackable item more than 1MC-146800- 村民可以将不可堆叠物品的折扣数量设置到 1 以上MC-146860- Trading sometimes takes the full price instead of the discounted price when player has the Hero of the Village effectMC-146860- 当玩家有「村庄英雄」状态效果时，交易有时候会是全价而不是折扣价MC-146919- Drowned, fish and guardians are not spawningMC-146919- 不生成溺尸、鱼和守卫者MC-147031- When a zombie wakes up a villager, the bed tag is still on occupied (occupied: true)MC-147031- 当僵尸吵醒村民以后，床仍在占用状态（occupied: true）MC-147056- Zombie villagers spawned with a zombie village move very fastMC-147056- 在僵尸村庄生成的僵尸村民移动超快MC-147207- hs_pid_error appears for no reason in snapshots.MC-147207- hs_pid_error 在快照中无理由地出现MC-147227- Shift-clicking an item out of the trading inventory instantly locks the tradeMC-147227- 按住 Shift 点击交易物品栏外的物品会立刻锁定交易MC-147240- Villagers can trade Arrows of LuckMC-147240- 村民可以交易幸运之箭MC-147268- Villagers don't run away from ravagers, pillagers, vindicators, evokers, zombies or husksMC-147268- 村民不会躲避劫掠兽、灾厄村民、卫道士、唤魔者、僵尸或尸壳MC-147270- Player can still move at normal speed and sprint while sneaking in a 1.5 blocks tall spaceMC-147270- 在 1.5 格高的空间中玩家依然能够以正常速度行走或疾跑MC-147274- Villager 'Happy' and 'Angry' particles not showing, even when particles are on 'All'MC-147274- 就算粒子特效全开也不显示村民的「高兴」和「愤怒」粒子效果MC-147298- Arrow facing down with 0 degrees on both x z (basically straight down) cannot be picked up and play a sound on loopMC-147298- 在 x z 轴上角度为 0（垂直向下）的箭不能被捡起来，并且会循环播放音效MC-147305- Player crouches with a delayMC-147305- 玩家下蹲有延迟MC-147363- "Villager disagrees" sound is played twice when right clicking a villager without tradesMC-147363- 右键村民并不交易时，村民播放了两次「拒绝」音效MC-147513- Unable to focus anvil textfield by clickingMC-147513- 不能通过点击聚焦到铁砧文本框MC-147529- Background is not dimmed for book or lecternMC-147529- 书或讲台的背景没有变暗MC-147532- Chunks stop loading after change view distanceMC-147532- 改变视野距离以后区块停止加载MC-147538- Cannot drag any slider in "Video Settings" optionsMC-147538- 不能拖动「视频设置」里的任何滑块MC-147560- Mobs stop spawning over time if the render distance is less than 11MC-147560- 渲染距离小于 11 时，生物会在一段时间后停止生成MC-147607- Command block text field isn't focused when opening the GUI anymoreMC-147607- 打开命令方块 GUI 时，文本框不再有焦点MC-147642- Narrator is toggled when typing in text fieldsMC-147642- 在文本框里打字时可以切换复述功能MC-147681- X-ray with door and slabMC-147681- 利用门和台阶透视


跨平台服务端Minecraft server jar


正版启动器下载地址Windowshttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/MinecraftInstaller.msiMac/OSXhttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.dmgLinux/Otherhttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/launcher/Minecraft.jar
关于本次更新的详细内容，请关注稍后 Minecraft 1.14（村庄与掠夺更新）特性列表 的更新。
预览版的下载方式以及运行说明对于正版用户官方启动器是跟进最及时、运行最稳定的启动器，每次启动均会自动检查并下载启动器最新版本。但由于亚马逊服务器https连接在国内时常不稳定，官方启动器下载游戏可能需要魔法上网。启动器在上文已经提供。适用于全平台。对于非正版用户非正版用户完全可以体验预览版本，请于推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。目前绝大多数主流启动器都带有游戏下载功能。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。

外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
Minecraft官网（内容英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Dinnerbone的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Grum的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Searge的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）Minecraft博客（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的Version history页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文 Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）

咳咳，mojang 把我的报告关了，然后修了后来一个人汇报的
the second address in the VMThread Stack always appears as the first address in the Reference Handler thread stack
这句话写了等于白写，mojira脑缺直接略过，真不知道是干什么的
话说这个好像只有 8u202 有。hotspot 给个 hs err pid，openj9 直接黑屏卡死

replies.txt_content:
1a2s3d4f1 发表于 2019-4-13 13:06

楼主没有轻信蝙蝠，有水平

总之现在这个bug修复了，楼主不用急了。
